name: Jinnborn Air Pirate
description: The Jinnborn Air Pirate embodies the essence of air and lightning, characterized by its flamboyant style and elemental powers.
memorable: Its ability to deal additional lightning damage and execute evasive maneuvers makes it a formidable opponent in combat.
goals: Typically seeks adventure on airships, engaging in piracy or exploration.
relations: May be encountered with other air or lightning-themed creatures, such as elementals or storm sorcerers.
environment: Commonly found aboard airships or in stormy regions.
strengths: Resists lightning damage and excels in mobility and naval navigation.
weaknesses: Moderate hit points and dependence on dexterity makes it vulnerable in protracted fights.
attacks: Uses a rapier for melee, dealing piercing plus lightning damage, and a shortbow for ranged attacks, also incorporating lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Elemental Weapons enhance weapon damage with an extra 1d6 lightning on successful hits.
equipment: Wields a rapier and a shortbow.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright.
skills: Skilled in navigation, particularly with airships or sandships, gaining proficiency bonuses.
additional_information: Can use Parry as a reaction to bolster defense against melee attacks.
Ability to add Charisma to AC when unarmored.
Embodies the spirit of non-lawful piracy.
Favors flamboyant personal style reflective of its elemental nature.
